description: The classBreaksInfo object provides information about the class breaks associated with the renderer.
title: colorClassBreakInfo

___description.description: String value used to describe the class.

___classMaxValue.description: A numeric value used to specify the maximum value for a break.

$eref.description: Color is represented as a three or four-element array. The four elements represent values for red, green, blue, and alpha in that order. Values range from 0 through 255. If color is undefined for a symbol, the color value is null.
$eref.title: color

___classMinValue.description: A numeric value used to specify discontinuous class breaks. If this value is null or is missing, the map server will calculate the minimum value based on the preceding class' maximum value.

___label.description: String value used to label the class.
